reviewText: All 4 of these movies are pretty bad.  The effects are bad, the acting is bad, the story is bad, most of them have big holes in the story and jump around without explanation.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I make it a point to check out all the zombie flicks, so this turned out to be a real bargain for me. Not something I would pop in around the kiddies as this stuff is pretty gory. Get ready for some intense zombie action my friends.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Four great old-fashioned campy zombie gorefest movies!  I loved every one of these & watched them back to back, marathon-style.  They can get REALLY gory at times so be warned.  You can tell by the titles what you are getting into here...just pure & simple, zombie movie greatness.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Zombie extravaganza, complete with enough gore to satisfy the hungriest gore-hound!  I got this figuring "I can't go wrong here" and I was completely right.  All four movies were complete zombie madness.  I am a satisfied customer.
